about.info: Located near to the Paragliding landing site, The Lost Hostels Bir - Landing Site offers river stream & mountain view with unique facilities in a relaxing and peaceful atmosphere. Throughout your stay we offer safe and clean facilities with OPEN KITCHEN, free Wi-Fi, en-suite bathrooms, common places to hang out and many more. We strive to ensure that our travelers get to stay with us as a part of the family. Travelers choose us because they like to meet new people, share their experiences & stories with each other and learn new culture while staying in the homely atmosphere but not for the facilities.

FAQs.question: Can you cook your own food at the hostel?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we have a communal kitchen area available for all of our guests to use. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need to cook your own meals. We also provide basic cooking utensils and cutlery, so you can prepare your own meals at your convenience.

FAQs.question: Is the property safe?
FAQs.answer: Lost Hostel has 24-hour reception and the hostel is equipped with CCTV cameras, so the property is generally considered safe. However, like any accommodation, it is always recommended to take basic safety precautions, such as locking your belongings and being aware of your surroundings.

FAQs.question: How's the internet speed?
FAQs.answer: Internet speed at Lost Hostel is really good. The hostel offers free WiFi throughout the property, and the speeds are typically fast enough to do office work, stream videos, download files, and use social media.

FAQs.question: Where can i go for paragliding ?
FAQs.answer: You can contact at reception to book your paragliding session

FAQs.question: Do they have female dorms?
FAQs.answer: No, We don't have a female specific dorm
